Runic Blade of Abyssion.description: A blade forged from obsidian and enchanted during the Echo Wars.
Runic Blade of Abyssion.abilities: Can sever magical connections to ley lines.
Runic Blade of Abyssion.notableUse: Linked to Seryndra, symbolizing the balance of light and shadow.

Bloodstone Amulet.description: A volatile artifact bound by shadow magic.
Bloodstone Amulet.abilities: Grants immense physical strength but tempts the wearer with corruption.
Bloodstone Amulet.notableUse: Central to Orion's journey to becoming a Guardian.
